snippet: Disney Publishing Worldwide has adapted "Brave," the tale of a Scottish princess, into an app. Like other Disney storybook apps, Brave: Storybook Deluxe skillfully blends art, animation and games.
abstract: Disney Publishing Worldwide has adapted "Brave," the tale of a Scottish princess, into an app. Like other Disney storybook apps, Brave: Storybook Deluxe skillfully blends art, animation and games.

headline.main: 'Brave' for Young Readers Who Want to Play Games, Too
headline.print_headline: ‘Brave’ for Young Readers Who Want to Play Games, Too
